keepConnect.name: Tshama u hlanganisiwile .
keepConnect.helperText: Loko u tsindziyela eka link yo sungula, kutani hlayisa link. Leswi swi lava nyingiso leswaku xihlanganisi xi ta tlhela xi hlanganisiwa hi ku ya emahlweni endzhaku ka loko xi tsemiwile.

url.name: URL .
url.helperText: URL ya xihlanganisi, xikombiso ws://192.168.0.2:7001, kumbe wws://example.com/path .
url.error: URL leyinene i URL leyi sungulaka hi ws:// kumbe wws:// .
